打ち合せる: (うちあわせる) - to knock together; to arrange (e.g. a meeting)
打ち合わせ: (uchiawase) - advance arrangements, preparatory meeting, briefing session; overlap (de um casaco, etc.)
打ち合わせる: (うちあわせる) - to knock together; to arrange (e.g. a meeting)
打ち噛ます: (ぶちかます) - {sumo} to ram one's opponent head-first in the initial charge; to punch hard/to hit hard
打ち固める: (うちかためる) - to harden by beating
打ち壊す: (うちこわす) - to destroy/to crush/to break by striking/to wreck; to spoil/to ruin
打ち始める: (うちはじめる) - to begin (emphatically); to launch; to embark on
打ち守る: (うちまもる) - to stare at; to closely defend
打ち寄せる: (うちよせる) - to break onto (shore); to wash ashore; to attack
打ち延ばす: (うちのばす) - to hammer out thinly (e.g. goldleaf)
打ち当たる: (ぶちあたる) - to slam into (e.g. a wall, a limit) (figuratively)/to hit; to face (e.g. trouble, a problem)/to confront
打ち所: (うちどころ) - spot to hit (on a person)
打ち手: (うちて) - shooter; (打ち手, 打手 only) drummer (taiko, etc.)
打ち払う: (うちはらう) - to brush away/to sweep aside; to repel (e.g. enemy)/to drive away/to rout
打ち抜き: (うちぬき) - punching (e.g. with a die)
打ち抜く: (ぶちぬく) - to punch/to hit and hit/to stamp out; to pierce/to bore into/to knock down walls
打ち拉がれる: (うちひしがれる) - to be stricken (e.g. with grief); to be battered (e.g. by disasters)
打ち拉ぐ: (うちひしぐ) - to crush (with the weight of misfortune)
打ち挙げる: (ぶちあげる) - to make a bold speech; to make a bold statement
打ち振る: (うちふる) - to brandish; to flourish; to wave; to swing; to shake at
打ち捨てる: (うちすてる) - to throw away; to abandon
打ち据える: (うちすえる) - to place firmly; to hit very hard
打ち掛け: (うちかけ) - women's bridal robe with trailing skirts worn over a kimono; (打ち掛け only) ending play for the day/leaving a game unfinished (esp. Go)
打ち揚げ: (うちあげ) - launching/launch; end (of a theatrical run, etc.); closing party (e.g. a theater show)/cast party/party to celebrate successful completion of a project
打ち揚げる: (うちあげる) - to launch/to shoot up; (of waves) to dash/to wash up (ashore); to finish (e.g. a theater run, sumo tournament)/to close; to report (to boss, etc.)
打ち損ない: (うちそこない) - mishit; poor stroke; poor shot
打ち損なう: (うちそこなう) - to fail to hit; to miss
打ち撒ける: (ぶちまける) - to throw out (everything); to tell frankly/to confess
打ち放し: (うちはなし) - undressed concrete/unfaced concrete; (golf) driving range
打ち放す: (ぶちはなす) - to unsheath a sword; to slay
打ち方: (うちかた) - way to hit or swing
打ち明かす: (うちあかす) - to be frank; to speak one's mind; to open one's heart
打ち明ける: (うちあける) - to be frank; to speak one's mind; to open one's heart
打ち明け話: (うちあけばなし) - confession; confidential talk; frank talk
打ち果す: (うちはたす) - to slay; to kill
打ち果たす: (うちはたす) - to slay; to kill
打ち止め: (うちどめ) - end (of an entertainment or match)
打ち止める: (うちとめる) - (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) to hammer into place; (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) (also うちどめる) to end (a performance); (撃ち止める refers esp. to a gun, and 討ち止める to a blade) to kill/to slay/to shoot dead/to cut down
打ち殺す: (うちころす) - to shoot to death
打ち水: (うちみず) - sprinkling water (to keep down dust and to cool pavements, etc.)
打ち消す: (うちけす) - to deny/to contradict; to negate (esp. a sound)/to drown out
打ち物: (うちもの) - forged weaponry (e.g. swords, spears, etc.)/forged weapon; molded dry confectionery/moulded dry confectionery; percussion instrument
打ち留め: (うちどめ) - end (of an entertainment or match)
打ち留める: (うちとめる) - (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) to hammer into place; (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) (also うちどめる) to end (a performance); (撃ち止める refers esp. to a gun, and 討ち止める to a blade) to kill/to slay/to shoot dead/to cut down
打ち眺める: (うちながめる) - to look afar; to look at something while absorbed in reverie/to look at something while absorbed in one's thoughts
打ち砕く: (ぶちくだく) - to smash; to crush
打ち破る: (うちやぶる) - to break; to smash; to defeat; to destroy; to eliminate
打ち立てる: (うちたてる) - to establish; to formulate
打ち竹: (うちたけ) - an antiquated lighter consisting of a tube of bamboo containing live coals (hidane)
打ち筋: (うちすじ) - {mahj} (an individual's) way of playing mahjong; mahjong tactics
打ち粉: (うちこ) - flour; powder (for polishing, dusting, etc.)
打ち続く: (うちつづく) - to continue for a long time; to undergo a repeated series
打ち続ける: (うちつづける) - to hit repeatedly
打ち臥す: (うちふす) - to mask oneself; to lie down
打ち萎れる: (うちしおれる) - to droop; to be depressed
打ち落す: (うちおとす) - to knock down; to shoot down; to lop off
打ち落とす: (うちおとす) - to knock down; to shoot down; to lop off
打ち見る: (うちみる) - to glance at; to look at
打ち解けにくい: (うちとけにくい) - difficult to make friends with
打ち解ける: (うちとける) - to open one's heart; to throw off reserve; to be frank
打ち込み: (うちこみ) - driving/pounding in/shooting into/implantation/invasion; falling badly in love; putting (one's heart) into; step recording (in electronic or computer music)
打ち込む: (ぶちこむ) - to throw/to toss/to cast; to hit/to strike/to smash/to hammer in/to drive in; to fire into (e.g. a crowd)/to launch (e.g. missiles)/to lob (e.g. grenades); to wear (sword, etc.)/to carry
打ち返す: (うちかえす) - to return a blow repeat; to turn back; to rewhip; to plow up; to plough up; to come and retreat
打ち連れる: (うちつれる) - to go along with
打ち過ぎる: (うちすぎる) - to pass by (time); to hit too much
打ち遣る: (うちやる) - to send afar; to leave alone/to abandon without care
打ち開ける: (ぶちあける) - to forcefully open up a hole (in a wall, etc.); to speak frankly, holding nothing back; to throw out everything inside
打ち首獄門: (うちくびごくもん) - beheading followed by mounting of the head on a pike in front of the prison (Edo period)
打ち鳴らす: (うちならす) - to ring; to clang
打っかける: (ぶっかける) - to dash (e.g. liquid on someone's face); to slosh; to splash; to souse; to pour
打ったくる: (ぶったくる) - to overcharge; to rip off; to rob; to soak
打った切る: (ぶったぎる) - to chop (a branch, etc.)
打っちゃり: (うっちゃり) - {sumo} trick of leaning back and carrying one's opponent round and out of the ring; last-minute reversal
打っちゃる: (うっちゃる) - to discard/to abandon; to neglect/to let be
打って一丸となる: (うっていちがんとなる) - to be united; to act as a single body
打って出る: (うってでる) - to launch oneself upon; to make one's debut
打って変わる: (うってかわる) - to change completely; to change suddenly
